title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 790.8 - Governing authority or operator
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 790.8 - Governing authority or operator

State Regulations
(a) The governing authority or operator is
the party responsible for the operation of a hospice. (b) The governing authority or operator shall
mean: (1)
the policy-making body of a
government agency; (2)
the officers
and the board of directors or trustees of a not-for-profit
corporation; (3)
the officers, board of directors and stockholders of a business corporation; and
(4)
the proprietor or proprietors of a
proprietary hospice. (c) An individual, partnership, corporation, organization or agency which has not
received establishment approval may not participate in the total gross income
or net revenue of a hospice. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
790.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
